Detailed Description

Utility class to store a function value and its derivatives.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

JetMatrix::JetMatrix ( const int  n_comps  ) 

Constructs a matrix with a arbitrary dimension

Dimension is the number of components whose function are stored into the JetMatrix

Parameters:
n_comps Dimension of the function stored into the JetMatrix

double *  values 
)

Constructs a Jet matrix filling initial values

Parameters:
n_comps Dimension of the function stored into the JetMatrix
degree Derivative degree associated with the initial array
values The new array of function, first and second derivative values
